item.title: Weekly Review #32 - Wuhan, Long-Awaited Reunions, and Flowing Emotions
item.description: 'クリスマスソング (English Cover) - Matt Cab' Preface This is a record and reflection of my life from 2023-02-21 to 2023-02-26. This week was relatively routine in terms of work, with no particularly urgent tasks. Despite being in a somewhat tense state due to personal matters, I felt less anxious and depressed. item.title: 2022 Year-End Review - Confusion, Low Points and Change
item.description: 'Here After Us - Mayday' Preface Today is the last day of 2022. As I mentioned in my previous weekly review: There will be an annual summary, covering various events of my year - things lost, things gained, things to be grateful for, and inevitable regrets. Though I hesitated about bringing up certain topics again, I decided to face them truthfully. After all, everything expires, even canned pineapples. This year too shall pass.
